required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Effectiveness of Abatacept in Psoriatic Arthritis Participants
clinical_study.official_title: Abatacept - Long-Term Real-Life Experience in Psoriatic Arthritis (PsA) in Germany: an Observational Study (ALTEA)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is a long-term, observational study of Abatacept in patients with Psoriatic Arthritis, a chronic inflammatory disorder.

primary_outcome.measure: Disease Activity index for PSoriatic Arthritis (DAPSA)

secondary_outcome.measure: Descriptive Analysis: Reasons for Abatacept initiation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 2 years prior to treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients previously receiving by type of Disease modifying anti-rheumatic drug (DMARD)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 2 years prior to treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Descriptive Analysis: Socio-Demographics at Treatment Initiation
Descriptive Analysis: Disease history at Treatment initiation
Incidence of Risk factors and Comorbidities

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 2 years prior to treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Descriptive Analysis: Change in participant characteristics and symptoms

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 2 months prior to treatment to 12 months post treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Rheumatologist: Type of Institution
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 2 months prior to treatment to 12 months post treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion and type of treatment after abatacept discontinuation
Proportion of reasons for abatacept discontinuation and initiation of new therapy

arm_group.description: naïve of abatacept, other biologic agents and Targeted synthetic disease modifying anti-rheumatic drugs (tsDMARDs)
"naïve of abatacept, who previously failed one tumor necrosis factor inhibitor (TNFi), but are naïve of any other biologic agent and tsDMARDs"
naïve of abatacept, who previously failed treatment with tsDMARDs and/or biologic agents** other than a single TNFi

study_pop.textblock: The patient population targeted by the study consists of patients with PsA that initiate treatment with abatacept

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participants 18 years or older
- Participants who signed an informed consent
- Participants diagnosed with PsA as per the criteria of the Classification of Psoriatic Arthritis (CASPAR) Study Group18
- Participants naïve of abatacept and who at their physician's discretion initiate abatacept
- Participants meeting criteria for abatacept treatment for PsA as specified in the German label
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participants who are currently included in any interventional clinical trial in PsA/Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA)
